thread.title: Gisele Bündchen Just Served Up the Best Super Bowl Hair Inspiration on Instagram
thread.title_full: Gisele Bündchen Just Served Up the Best Super Bowl Hair Inspiration on Instagram

author: Calin Van Paris
title: Gisele Bündchen Just Served Up the Best Super Bowl Hair Inspiration on Instagram
text: A photo posted by Gisele Bündchen (@gisele) on Jan 22, 2017 at 8:19pm PST How do you celebrate both a conference championship and forthcoming Super Bowl playoff? If you’re Gisele Bündchen , with soft, golden lengths. The supermodel struck a pose alongside husband Tom Brady—longtime quarterback for the New England Patriots—yesterday, showing off matching caps commemorating the Pat’s Conference Championship win and forthcoming journey to Super Bowl LI. And while Brady’s look was that of an all-smiles, all-American sportsman, Bündchen augmented her game time accessory with a cascade of trademark waves that spilled from her hat and over shoulders. Football fans, take note: this year’s game day hair is the easiest path yet to a beauty touchdown.
